spirit:field.spirit:name: apb_to_axi_mode_select
spirit:field.spirit:description: APB to AXI read mode select 1'b1: The read cycle is at least one clock later than read address cycle 1'b0: The read cycle happens at the same cycle as read address cycle

spirit:field.spirit:name: pix_gen_mode
spirit:field.spirit:description: Pixel generator mode select 2'b00: black 2'b01: white 2'b10: Gray 2'b11: dark gray

spirit:field.spirit:name: pix_gen_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Select pixel generator as input to stream generator 0: Input from IntoPix decoder 1:Input from pixel generator

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_enh_frm_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP enhanced framing mode enable. The enhanced mode is enabled when this bit is set to 1.

spirit:field.spirit:name: decoder_error_inject
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write 1 to inject a cycle of random error.

spirit:field.spirit:name: vid_stream_generator_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enable video related logic in stream_generator module

spirit:field.spirit:name: syn_stream_generator_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Enable DP stream synthesize related logic in stream_generator module

spirit:field.spirit:name: sdp_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: SDP enable. The SDP function is enabled when it is 1

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane_bit_rate
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP serial bit rate 2'b00: RBR (1.62 Gbps) 2'b01: HBR (2.70 Gbps) 2'b10: HBR2 (5.40 Gbps) 2'b11: HBR3(8.10 Gbps)

spirit:field.spirit:name: tps_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Training pattern selection 4'd0: TPS0 (No test pattern. DP functional mode 4'd1: TPS1 4'd2: TPS2 4'd3: TPS3 4'd4: CP2520 pattern 1 4'd5: CP2520 pattern 2- 4'd6: CP2520 pattern 2+ 4'd7: CP2520 pattern 3 (Also called TPS4) 4'd8: Custom 80-bit pattern

spirit:field.spirit:name: lane_num
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of active dp lanes 2'b00: 1 lane 2'b01: 2 lanes 2'b10: Invalid 2'b11: 4 lanes

spirit:field.spirit:name: enable
spirit:field.spirit:description: Scrambler enable bit. The scrambler is enabled when this bit is set to 1. The scrambler is bypassed when this bit is set to 0

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_start_level
spirit:field.spirit:description: The level cs buffer needs to filled before is read

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_pkt_length
spirit:field.spirit:description: The length of code stream packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: pix_start_level
spirit:field.spirit:description: The level elasticity buffer needs to filled before is read

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_fifo_level_check_frequency
spirit:field.spirit:description: The frequency of allowing CS packet interval to be updated. The unit is number of lines. It is applicable if "cs_pkt_interval_feedback_ctrl_debug" is set to 1 otherwise the update occurs at every line.

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_pkt_interval
spirit:field.spirit:description: The average interval of cs packets

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_pkt_interval_feedback_ctrl
spirit:field.spirit:description: CS packet interval feedback control 1'b0: Use cs_pkt_interval register as input to negative feedback logic 1'b1: Use previous latched value as input to negative feedback logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: cs_pkt_interval_feedback_ctrl_debug
spirit:field.spirit:description: CS packet interval feedback control debug bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_width_total_feedback_ctrl
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP width feedback control 1'b0: Use dp_width_total register as input to negative feedback logic 1'b1: Use previous latched value as input to negative feedback logic

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_width_total_feedback_ctrl_debug
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP width feedback control debug bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_width_total_minus_offset1
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP total width minus offset 1 used when read and write rates are within the

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_width_active
spirit:field.spirit:description: Active region DP width per lane in symbol

spirit:field.spirit:name: dp_width_total
spirit:field.spirit:description: Total DP width per lane in symbol

spirit:field.spirit:name: valid_bytes_repeat_num
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of TUs with valid bytes per full TU before increment by one

spirit:field.spirit:name: valid_bytes_per_full_tu
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of valid bytes in one transfer unit per lane

spirit:field.spirit:name: valid_bytes_num_per_lane
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of valid bytes per lane per line

spirit:field.spirit:name: nvid_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP stream NVID sel 1: Use nvid_set_value register 0: Use nvid in the MSA packet sent by LEX

spirit:field.spirit:name: mvid_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: DP stream MVID sel 2'b00: : Use measured value with mvid in the MSA packet sent by LEX for the initial value 2'b01: Use mvid_set_value register 2'b10: Use measured value with mvid_set_value register for the initial value. 2'b11: use mvid in the MSA packet sent by LEX

spirit:field.spirit:name: mvid_set_value
spirit:field.spirit:description: mvid set value when msa_mvid_sel is 2'b01

spirit:field.spirit:name: insert_line_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: Vertical blanking line selection for MSA insertion

spirit:field.spirit:name: nvid_set_value
spirit:field.spirit:description: nvid set value when msa_nvid_sel is 1'b0

spirit:field.spirit:name: reserved
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bits 5:3 field for reseved bits

spirit:field.spirit:name: y_only
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bit 7 field for Y-only and Raw video

spirit:field.spirit:name: stereo
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bits 2:1 field for Stereo video attribute 0 = No 3D video

spirit:field.spirit:name: int_total
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_1 bit 0 field for interlaced video

spirit:field.spirit:name: color
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_0 bits 7:1 for the Colorimetry field See DP 1.2 page 78 0x00 = RGB 18bpp 0x10 = RGB 24bpp 0x20 = RGB 30bpp 0x30 = RGB 36bpp 0x40 = RGB 48bpp

spirit:field.spirit:name: clk_sync
spirit:field.spirit:description: msa misc_0 bit 0 for synchronous clock. 0 = Link and main video clock are asynchronous 1 = Link and main video clock are synchronous

spirit:field.spirit:name: mvid
spirit:field.spirit:description: Msa MVID value plugged into DP stream

spirit:field.spirit:name: nvid
spirit:field.spirit:description: Msa NVID value plugged into DP stream

spirit:register.spirit:name: fsm_status
spirit:register.spirit:description: Stream generator module cs FIFO status register

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_status
spirit:register.spirit:description: Stream generator module cs FIFO status register

spirit:field.spirit:name: ae1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 1 status. A "1" indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. The threshold level is set by aet1 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: af1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 1 status. A "1" indicates an almost full or full FIFO. The threshold level is set by aft1 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: ae0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 0 status. A "1" indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. The threshold level is set by aet0 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: af0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 0 status. A "1" indicates an almost full or full FIFO. The threshold level is set by aft0 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full

spirit:field.spirit:name: empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: aet0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 0 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or below this threshold then ae0 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: aft0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 0 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or above this threshold then af0 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: aet1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 1 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or below this threshold then ae1 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: aft1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 1 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or above this threshold then af1 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: sr_0_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: SR 0 underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in SR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: sr_1_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: SR 1 underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in SR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: sr_2_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: SR 2 underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in SR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: sr_3_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: SR 3 underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in SR.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_ae1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 1 status. A "1" indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. The threshold level is set by aet1 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_af1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 1 status. A "1" indicates an almost full or full FIFO. The threshold level is set by aft1 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_ae0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 1 status. A "1" indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. The threshold level is set by aet0 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_af0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 1 status. A "1" indicates an almost full or full FIFO. The threshold level is set by aft0 field.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO 0 overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO 0 underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO 0 full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_0_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO 0 empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: aet0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 0 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or below this threshold then ae0 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: aft0
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 0 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or above this threshold then af0 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: aet1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty 1 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or below this threshold then ae1 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: aft1
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full 1 threshold setting. If FIFO level is equal or above this threshold then af1 goes high

spirit:field.spirit:name: offset
spirit:field.spirit:description: The offset used to shift the threshold levels

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full

spirit:field.spirit:name: empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: overflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO overflow status. A "1" indicates overflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: underflow
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO underflow status. A "1" indicates underflow in FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status. A "1" indicates FIFO is full

spirit:field.spirit:name: empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status. A "1" indicates FIFO is empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth. This value is used for the build

spirit:field.spirit:name: maud_set_value
spirit:field.spirit:description: The manual value used for Maud

spirit:field.spirit:name: maud_method_sel
spirit:field.spirit:description: The maud setting method 0: Manual value 1: Extracted value from audio time stamp packet

spirit:field.spirit:name: audiomute_flag
spirit:field.spirit:description: The audiomute flag received from LEX

spirit:field.spirit:name: vfr_handshake
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with a fault on handshake (vid_enbl='1' while vid_valid='0')

spirit:field.spirit:name: cfr_handshake
spirit:field.spirit:description: Number of images with a fault on handshake (cs_enbl='1' while cs_ready='0')

spirit:field.spirit:name: err_id
spirit:field.spirit:description: Error Identification when err_flag is set First error identified in the current frame: 1-2 = internal error 3 = error on the codestream input interface 4 = error on the video output interface 5 = mismatch between codestream header config and video size config 6 = external abort

spirit:field.spirit:name: err_flag
spirit:field.spirit:description: Error detected during the processing of the current frame.

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats0
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_pix_0_level
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pixel 0 FIFO level at beginning of DP frame

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_pix_0_level_watermark
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pixel 0 FIFO level at beginning of DP frame (watermark)

spirit:registerFile.spirit:name: stats1
spirit:registerFile.spirit:description: All the Statistic Registers and their configuration.

spirit:register.spirit:name: rd2clr_config
spirit:register.spirit:description: Configures if the stats register read by s/w clears the read register. A 1 in any bit configures the h/w to clear the corresponding stats register after a s/w read of that stats register.

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_ae0
spirit:register.spirit:description: CS FIFO almost empty threshold 0 count

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_ae1
spirit:register.spirit:description: CS FIFO almost empty threshold 1 count

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_af0
spirit:register.spirit:description: CS FIFO almost full threshold 0 count

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_af1
spirit:register.spirit:description: CS FIFO almost full threshold 1 count

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_level
spirit:register.spirit:description: CS FIFO level at beginning of DP frame

spirit:register.spirit:name: fifo_cs_level_watermark
spirit:register.spirit:description: CS FIFO level at beginning of DP frame (watermark)

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which enabled interrupts have triggered, Write 1 to clear

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
